Posts.EditableText:
hello.  i am using damadbrit's library to make a new game and it seems that regardless of whether an object is set to takeable or not, the player can't pick it up when they try to, getting the message 'that would be no use' or something.

does anyone know why this is happening, and how i can fix it?
Posts.HTML:
hello. i am using damadbrit's library to make a new game and it seems that regardless of whether an object is set to takeable or not, the player can't pick it up when they try to, getting the message 'that would be no use' or something.

does anyone know why this is happening, and how i can fix it?

Posts.EditableText: set it as a normal object.
Posts.HTML: set it as a normal object.

Posts.EditableText:

sorry about that.  thanks a lot.

using this library makes writing games a load more fun.
